entities.name: dobby
entities.description: Dobby is a house-elf who is bound to serve the Malfoy family. He is described as being mistreated and enslaved.

entities.name: harry potter
entities.description: Harry Potter is a wizard who is being threatened by Dobby's Bludger. Dobby wants Harry to be sent home because he believes it will save his life.

entities.name: he who must not be named
entities.description: He Who Must Not Be Named is a powerful and feared wizard who has enslaved many house-elves like Dobby.

relationships.description: Dobby wants to save Harry Potter's life by getting him sent home.

relationships.entity_1: he who must not be named
relationships.description: He Who Must Not Be Named has enslaved Dobby and many other house-elves.
